title: Do Riot even care?
body:
So I'm curious, do Riot even know about the bot problem that has been going on for years, do they not really care because it's mainly in ARAM or are their coders just underpaid and can't figure out how to fix the problem?

I know i'm not the only person that plays ARAM only and I'm sure as hell not the only one that is getting pissed off with having half your team as bots or playing against half a team of bots.

replies.body: I had this happen in a Normal game, with a Caitlin top that only bought her starting item 5 mins in after she was 0/3, and had 6 CS at 20 mins. Thankfully Ekko and I were fed enough to carry.
